document.full_text: syrian forces killed at least 13 civilians in the central town of rastan thursday, activists said, in the latest attempt to quell a revolt against the 11-year rule of president bashar al-assad.
document.title: syrian forces kill 13 in besieged town: activists
lines_and_colors: syrian forces killed at least 13 civilians in the central town of rastan thursday, activists said, in the latest attempt to quell a revolt against the 11-year rule of president bashar al-assad.
